headline: Dana Incorporated Announces Appointment of Byron Foster as Chief Executive Officer
summary: Dana Incorporated (NYSE: DAN) today announced that its board of directors has appointed Byron Foster as Chief Executive Officer, effective July 1, 2026. This planned effective date allows for a structured transition period. R. Bruce McDonald, who has served as Chairman and CEO since 2024, will continue in his role as Chairman of the Board.

headline: LiquidStack buy gives Trane AI data center cooling exposure
summary: A Trane Technologies executive said LiquidStack’s systems would help it serve customers running increasingly powerful workloads.
